document_data.mainbody:
he Skull of Death was a unique magical helmet that was crafted by the lich NAshtar Nikadeemus.
The skull was made from the bones of Nikadeemus parents.
The Skull of Death possessed a number of charges. Each charge allowed the wearer to instantly kill every living being within a certain area.
NAshtar Nikadeemus bestowed the Skull of Death upon one of his greatest generals, who used it to slay the commanders they encountered on the battlefield.
It was rumored to have been destroyed some time after the lich was himself bested.
However, in 1369 DR, the skull was in the possession of the mage Vithal.
